posts.title: Completing my TechStar 2025 Journey
posts.content: I'm thrilled to share that I've successfully completed the TechStar 2025 Program! This six-month journey provided exclusive learning experiences and valuable collaborations that fueled both my professional and personal growth. Here's to continuous growth and reinvention! #FY25TechStar #DataAIATCPCommunity #AccenturePH #ReinventYourFuture

posts.title: Linear Regression Gives Thunder 70% Edge Over Pacers in Game 7
posts.content: A linear regression on past Game 7 point margins gives OKC around 70% chance of beating Indiana and taking home the championship.
